overview:
Shriv ComMedia Solutions (SCMS) - an advanced global IT and BPO service provider from India, is focused to offer flexible business-centered solutions that enables to improve day-to-day implementation of our clientâ€™s business strategies. We work to develop and support software that facilitates our customers to have quality, worth, and value of their time and money.

SCMS was founded in the year 2001 and has been continuously expanding. We are engaged in providing bespoke software development services that are sourced to bring â€˜valueâ€™ to our customers. We provide IT services in a dynamic environment, where business and technology strategies are conveniently converged.

With every passing day, we are set to provide our worth. With our head office located in India, we are slowly making our global appearance with offshore offices in US, UK and Canada. We have garnered our reputation through a spirit of innovation and hard work. As an India Offshore Software Development Company we have already acquired global clients with customers in Canada, Dubai, UK, US, Australia, and Germany. We are exploring new horizons and successfully grasping opportunities that drive in our way.

At SCMS, every software solution delivered is directed by guiding principles of meeting deadlines, satisfying clientâ€™s preferences, and risk management. These are the tenets that we strictly comply with every offshore software development project undertaking. Our core proficiency is focused on the designing and implementation of state-of-the-art software solutions, E learning, multimedia development, and web solutions. Our professional staff has served fortune 500 and government clients, encompassing finance, healthcare, defense, information technology, telecommunication, and pharmaceutical sectors. No doubt, succeeding projects comes to us and our effort continuesâ€¦

milestones.description: SCMS participated in CeBIT 2011 from 31st May to 2nd June 2011, Darling Harbour, Australia.
